Sentencas: The fast dynamic response of fuel cells is very important in load-varying applications.
Titulo: The impact of gas flow channel design on dynamic performance of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The design of gas flow channels has a significant role in fuel cells' performance.
Titulo: The impact of gas flow channel design on dynamic performance of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The impact of channels' geometry on the steady operation of fuel cells has been widely studied; however, the literature lacks research on the effects of channel design on the dynamic response of fuel cells.
Titulo: The impact of gas flow channel design on dynamic performance of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The present study investigates the effects of channel design on the transient response of a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: The impact of gas flow channel design on dynamic performance of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this regard, three most common types of channel design alterations (changing the width-to-height ratio of rectangular cross-section, changing the cross-sectional shape of the channel, and tapering the channel cross-section toward the channel outlet) are considered.
Titulo: The impact of gas flow channel design on dynamic performance of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results reveal that decreasing the channel width-to-height ratio, replacing the rectangular cross-section with a triangular one, and converting the straight channel into a tapered one, reduce the power response time by up to 54.2%, 7.1%, and 41.4%, respectively, depending on the operating conditions.
Titulo: The impact of gas flow channel design on dynamic performance of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It is also observed that channel tapering is the only channel design alteration that improves both steady and unsteady operations.
Titulo: The impact of gas flow channel design on dynamic performance of a solid oxide fuel cell
